trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of TableMapping objects, and is implemented by the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection"></xref>, which is used in common by .NET Framework data providers.
The ITableMappingCollection interface allows an inheriting class to implement a TableMapping collection.
For more information, see [DataAdapter DataTable and DataColumn Mappings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
An application does not create an instance of the ITableMappingCollection interface directly, but creates an instance of a class that inherits ITableMappingCollection.
Classes that inherit ITableMappingCollection must implement the inherited members, and typically define additional members to add provider-specific functionality.
For example, the ITableMappingCollection interface defines one implementation of the <xref:System.Data.ITableMappingCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.
In turn, the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection> class inherits this method, and defines two additional overloads of <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection.RemoveAt%2A>.
Adds a table mapping to the collection.
The case-sensitive name of the source table.
The name of the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> table.
A reference to the newly-mapped <xref href="System.Data.ITableMapping"></xref> object.
Gets a value indicating whether the collection contains a table mapping with the specified source table name.
The case-sensitive name of the source table.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a table mapping with the specified source table name exists, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the TableMapping object with the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> table name.
The name of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataSet" name="DataSet" href=""></xref> table within the collection.
The TableMapping object with the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataSet" name="DataSet" href=""></xref> table name.
Gets the location of the <xref href="System.Data.ITableMapping"></xref> object within the collection.
The case-sensitive name of the source table.
The zero-based location of the <xref href="System.Data.ITableMapping"></xref> object within the collection.
Gets or sets the instance of <xref href="System.Data.ITableMapping"></xref> with the specified <xref:System.Data.ITableMapping.SourceTable*> name.
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_SourceTable" name="SourceTable" href=""></xref> name of the <xref href="System.Data.ITableMapping"></xref>.
The instance of <xref href="System.Data.ITableMapping"></xref> with the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_SourceTable" name="SourceTable" href=""></xref> name.
Removes the <xref href="System.Data.ITableMapping"></xref> object with the specified <xref:System.Data.ITableMapping.SourceTable*> name from the collection.
The case-sensitive name of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_SourceTable" name="SourceTable" href=""></xref>.
